souvenir1.name: Sword
souvenir1.description: Take home your very own knights sword! Crafted out of the same steel as Excalibur, this sword will transform any young peasant into a kings knight in no time!

souvenir2.name: Crown
souvenir2.description: Now you can rule your very own kingdom! Take control of your royal court with this authentic medieval crown!

souvenir3.name: goblet
souvenir3.description: Never worry about what you're going to drink your wine from again! This goblet is sure to make anybody into the talk of the party!
